query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS edge_gateways (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  gateway_code VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  production_line_id INT,
  ip_address VARCHAR(45),
  mac_address VARCHAR(17),
  status ENUM('online', 'offline', 'syncing', 'error', 'maintenance') DEFAULT 'offline' NOT NULL,
  last_heartbeat BIGINT,
  last_sync_at BIGINT,
  buffer_capacity INT DEFAULT 10000,
  current_buffer_size INT DEFAULT 0,
  sync_interval INT DEFAULT 60,
  cpu_usage DECIMAL(5,2),
  memory_usage DECIMAL(5,2),
  disk_usage DECIMAL(5,2),
  firmware_version VARCHAR(50),
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_gateway_code (gateway_code),
  INDEX idx_gateway_status (status),
  INDEX idx_gateway_line (production_line_id)
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2bBfAdpTc8yvngq.root --database RpnsLdN3u3f6PBDr9mn7Zq --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS edge_gateways (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  gateway_code VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  production_line_id INT,
  ip_address VARCHAR(45),
  mac_address VARCHAR(17),
  status ENUM('online', 'offline', 'syncing', 'error', 'maintenance') DEFAULT 'offline' NOT NULL,
  last_heartbeat BIGINT,
  last_sync_at BIGINT,
  buffer_capacity INT DEFAULT 10000,
  current_buffer_size INT DEFAULT 0,
  sync_interval INT DEFAULT 60,
  cpu_usage DECIMAL(5,2),
  memory_usage DECIMAL(5,2),
  disk_usage DECIMAL(5,2),
  firmware_version VARCHAR(50),
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_gateway_code (gateway_code),
  INDEX idx_gateway_status (status),
  INDEX idx_gateway_line (production_line_id)
)
